summary: KVM: x86: fix typo in __try_cmpxchg_user causing non-atomicness
details:
KVM: x86: fix typo in __try_cmpxchg_user causing non-atomicness

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.2 by commit 7cef7042458c52a401d30f2823ae9e9f22f3a90c, it was introduced in version v5.18.2 by commit e964665cc7ca13a16992b205fce63554b9efc78b. For more details please see the references link.
